metadata.title: CVE-2019-10166 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: It was discovered that libvirtd, versions 4.x.x before 4.10.1 and 5.x.xbefore 5.4.1, would permit readonly clients to use thevirDomainManagedSaveDefineXML() API, which would permit them to modifymanaged save state files. If a managed save had already been created by aprivileged user, a local attacker could modify this file such that libvirtdwould execute an arbitrary program when the domain was resumed.

criterions.comment: libvirt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
